replies.msg:
腎病貓食既食物係要盡量控制蛋白質含量唔可以太高
理論上就只食處方糧會比較好
不過乾糧咁乾其實對個腎都唔係太好
如果我自己隻貓有時既話我會用全濕糧

quote.msg: 其實獸醫係咪唔識做手術，見佢地做親就算好細既手術 啲寵物都無lala死左

replies.msg: 每個手術都有一定既麻醉同手術風險，開刀前會做身體檢查/驗血去評估病人既身體狀況從而可以更好咁去控制麻醉風險。好唔好彩有時動物會有d病只係做身體檢查/驗血係睇唔到出黎，呢d病有機會係麻醉期間發作，引致死亡率增高。

quote.msg: 其實獸醫係咪唔識做手術，見佢地做親就算好細既手術 啲寵物都無lala死左

replies.msg:
I doubt if the first year students can give you an answer.

1) Just like human doctors, vets are qualified to do surgeries. But most vets only do the common surgeries such as neutering. More experienced vets are capable of doing surgeries such as mass removal, GDV, and some orthopaedic surgeries. Vets who want to be good at surgeries usually do a 3-4 year long surgical residency followed by board exams. Once they have passed the tough exams, they become qualified surgeons (專科）. You can see “Dip ECVS”, “Dip ACVS” or “FANZCVS” after their names depending on where they passed their exams.

2) However, all these have nothing to do with the mortality rate of animals on the table. There are many factors which affect the mortality rate. Here are some of them:
a) The anesthetist pays a more important role than the surgeon in surgery. Some clinics in Hong Kong may not have an anesthetist to continuously monitor the patients for elective procedures such as scaling etc. It could be a risk when something happens.

b) It depends on the health status of the animals. The old ones and babies are at higher risk. As in human, animals with systemic diseases have higher risks at anesthesia. Anesthetists use a system called “The ASA physical status classification system” to determine the anesthetic risk for individual animals.

c) It depends what species it is. Anaesthetics are quite safe for dogs and cats in general. Animals such as rabbits and rats may have a higher anaesthetic risk. Horses are worse and giraffes are hopeless.

I hope you get to read this last bit which is the most important part of my answer- you only get to hear about the animals which died in surgeries, but you never hear about the survivors.
我見親就算人類醫生做一場簡單細手術都要幾個senior帶住做好多場 深入研究學習點做，重要考試評估過先得，個curative rate重好高，但我見啲獸醫真係昆錢咁 為左錢就亂叫啲動物去做手術 重要唔係好識都要做 你話做人類既手術都咁嚴謹，請問獸醫學同咁多種幾百種動物做手術係咪都係咁呢
